credit_line: Gift of Toni and Stuart B. Young, Class of 1957 in memory of Whitney S. Stoddard, Class of 1935
title: Trinity Courtyard
inscriptions: verso upper edge in pencil on paper (partially illegible and obscured by hinges): untitled (Trinity Church and Buildings - Lower Manhattan) c.1910   NBM/ 4/13/84; verso u.l. in pencil: John Marin/ Per/ John Marin Jr.; verso u.r. in pencil: SR10.75   13 7/8 x 9 7/8/ 8R#87/ Untitled (Trinity Churchyard)/ c.1910; verso l.r. in pencil: #34897; verso on backing: [2 Kennedy Galleries, Inc. labels, 1 Owings-Dewey Fine Art label, 1 Sid Deutsch Gallery label]
